document.docAuthor: Williams, Douglas J. & Denno, Barbara D.
document.docTitle: New genus names, family-group names and misspellings published between 2020 and 2023 in the scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Coccomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genus names, family-group names and misspellings published between 2020 and 2023 in the scale insects (Hemiptera: Sternorrhyncha: Coccomorpha)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Natural History Museum, Department of Life Sciences, Cromwell Road, London, SW7 5BD, U.K.
Florida State Collection of Arthropods, Department of Plant Industry, Gainesville, Florida, U.S.A.

emphasis.docTitle: New genus names, family-group names and misspellings published between 2020 and 2023 in the scale insects ( Hemiptera : Sternorrhyncha: Coccomorpha)

subSection.paragraph:
DOUGLAS J. WILLIAMS 1 &
BARBARA D. DENNO
2 *

emphasis.docAuthorAffiliation: Natural History Museum, Department of Life Sciences, Cromwell Road, London, SW7 5BD, U.K.

subSection.paragraph: Ễ djwilliamstriloc@aol.com; https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2989-5242

emphasis.docAuthorAffiliation:
Florida State Collection of Arthropods , Department of Plant Industry , Gainesville,
Florida , U.S.A.

subSection.paragraph:
*Corresponding author: Ễ
Barbara .Denno@usda.gov; https://orcid.org/0009-0003-1930-6704

Abrococcus Zheng & Wu, 2023: 356
. Type species
Abrococcus cunninghamia Zheng & Wu.
Qinococcidae (archaeococcoids).

Albotachaedina Xu, Liu, Wang, Li & Wu, 2023: 48 . A misspelling of
Albotachardina Zhang.
Tachardiidae (= Kerriidae ) (neococcoids).

Bambusaecoccus Meng & Xing, 2022b: 420
. Type species
Bambusaecoccus maolanensis Meng & Xing.
Coccidae (neococcoids). The author placed the species in the tribe Paralecaniini .

Bandamacoccus Hodgson, 2023: 494
. Type species
Bandamacoccus labiosus Hodgson.
Coccidae (neococcoids).

Bugandacoccus Hodgson, 2021: 63
. Type species
Ceronema (Ceroplastodes) gowdeyi Newstead.
Coccidae (neococcoids).

Carphococcus Miller & Stocks, 2022: 44
. Type species
Carphococcus apodus Miller & Stocks.
Eriococcidae (neococcoids).

Conchanspis Kondo & Watson, 2022: 13 . A misspelling of
Conchaspis Cockerell.
Conchaspididae (neococcoids).

Coronaproctus Li, Xu & Wu, 2023: 435
. Type species
Coronaproctus castanopsis Li, Xu & Wu.
Monophlebidae (archaeococcoids).

Dysmicocccus
Geetha et al ., 2022: 1142
. A misspelling of
Dysmicoccus Ferris.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Drosica
Ahmed et al ., 2023: 744
. A misspelling of
Drosicha Walker.
Monophlebidae (archaeococcoids).

Ezzatacoccus Evans & Abd-Rabou, 2023: 16 . Type species:
Amonostherium arabicum Ezzat.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Fimbriaticoccus Gullan & Williams, 2021: 296 . Type species
Ripersia leptospermi Maskell.
Eriococcidae (neococcoids). The species was originally described as a mealybug ( Pseudococcidae ) but was transferred to the Eriococcidae by Williams (1985).

Fonscocolombia
Ülgentürk et al ., 2022
: S123. A misspelling of
Fonscolombia Lichtenstein.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Formicoccus Tanaka, Suetsugu & Kamitani, 2021: 171
. A misspelling of
Formicococcus Takahashi.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).
Glabracoccus Gullan, 2021: 6. Type species Glabracoccus pomaderris Gullan. Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Gompholopium Gavrilov-Zimin, 2021: 52
. Type species
Gompholopium quercicola Gavrilov-Zimin.
Monophlebidae (archaeococcoids). The author placed this genus in the family Margarodidae s. lat ., subfamily Monophlebinae .

Illovococcus Hodgson, 2021: 61
. Type species
Ceronema mobile Brain.
Coccidae (neococcoids).

Londonia Choi & Lee, 2022: 365 . A misspelling of
Londiania De Lotto.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Macrococcu s
Choi & Lee, 2022: 365 . A misspelling of
Macrocepicoccus Morrison.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Mapia Foldi, 2020: 156
. Type species
Mapia kraussi Foldi.
Monophlebidae (archaeococcoids). The author placed this genus in the tribe Cryptokermesini .

Mckenzieana Meng & Xing, 2022: 299
. Type species
Helaspis mexicana McKenzie.
Diaspididae (neococcoids).
Mckenzieana
is a replacement name for the preoccupied name
Helaspis McKenzie.

Mesophthirus Gao, Shih, Rasnitsyn & Ren
, in
Gao et al . 2019: 2
. Type species:
Mesophthirus engeli Gao, Shih, Rasnitsyn & Ren.
This insect was originally described in Phthiraptera: Mesophthiridae : incertae sedis .
Poinar et al . (2020)
transferred it to Hemiptera : Coccomorpha: Xylococcidae (archaeococcoids).

Nagoyacoccus Tanaka, in Tanaka & Kamitani 2023: 363 . Type species
Nagoyacoccus philippinensis Tanaka.
Coccidae (neococcoids). The author placed this genus in the subfamily Pulvinariscinae .

Neoceronema Hodgson, 2021: 58
. Type species
Ceronema africanum McFie.
Coccidae (neococcoids).

Neoprimaspis Meng & Xing, 2022a: 299
. Type species
Primaspis tippinsi Howell.
Diaspididae (neococcoids).
Neoprimaspis
is a replacement name for the preoccupied name
Primaspis Howell.

Novmammilla Jian & Xing, 2022: 149
. Type species
Mammilla jinzhaiensis Wu.
Aclerdidae (neococcoids). This is a replacement name for
Mammilla Wu
, preoccupied.

Obuspedum
Wu et al ., 2020: 441
. A misspelling of
Orbuspedum Gavrilov-Zimin.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Pelioccoccus Evans & Abd-Rabou, 2023: 10 . A misspelling of
Peliococcus .
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Phenaccocus
Ahmed et al ., 2023: 746
. A misspelling of
Phenacoccus Cockerell.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Poliaspiodes
Ülgentürk et al ., 2022
: S121. A misspelling of
Poliaspoides MacGillivray.
Diaspididae (neococcoids).

Pseudococcu
Kakoti et al ., 2022: 9
, Table 2. A misspelling of
Pseudococcus Westwood.
Pseudococcidae (neococcoids).

Qinococcus Wu
, in
Wu et al. 2022: 544
. Type species
Qinococcus podocarpus Wu.
Qinococcidae (archaeococcoids).

Stimacoccus
Martins-Mansani et al ., 2021: 1
. A misspelling of
Stigmacoccus Hempel.
Stigmacoccidae (archaeococcoids).

Testudovestis Hodgson, 2021: 71
. Type species
Testudovestis africana Hodgson.
Coccidae (neococcoids).
Thecatosoma Takagi, 2022: 30 . Type species Thecatosoma caudatum Takagi. Diaspididae (neococcoids).

Wuel Jian & Xing, 2022: 149 . A misspelling of
Wuelagatis Jian & Xing.
Asterolecaniidae (neococcoids).

Wuelagatis Jian & Xing, 2022: 149
. Type species
Elagatis tongzaense Wu.
Asterolecaniidae (neococcoids). This is a replacement name for
Elagatis Wu
, preoccupied. (Note: the type species name is amended here to
W. tongzaensis
to agree with the masculine genus name).

Wuelnom Jian & Xing, 2022: 149 . A misspelling of
Wuelagatis .
Asterolecaniidae (neococcoids).

Ypofloiococcus Miller & Stocks, 2022: 198
. Type species
Ypofloiococcus libeauae Miller & Stocks.
Eriococcidae (neococcoids).

Qinococcus Wu
, in
Wu et al . 2022
. Qinococcidae Wu in
Wu et al. 2022: 544
. (archaeococcoids).

Rastrococcus Ferris, 1954: 55
. Pseudococcidae (neococcoids). Rastrococcinae Choi & Lee, 2022: 366 . This new subfamily, with the subfamilies Pseudococcinae and Phenacoccinae, is the third to be established in the family Pseudococcidae .

The authors thank Prof. Giuseppina Pellizzari (Department of Agronomy, Food, Natural Resources, Animals and Environment (DAFNAE), University of Padova, Italy ) for kindly checking the manuscript. We thank San-An Wu (The Key Laboratory for Silviculture and Conservation of Ministry of Education, Beijing Forestry University, Beijing 100083, P. R. China ) for allowing us to use the photo of Paraputo nanlingensis Li & Wu 2024, described in Zootaxa 5406 (3), as our cover image.
